issue.title: how to disable plasma print connection info to python
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13920](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13920). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Hi, I'm using plasma in joblib to help with dataframe transferring. But plasma client will print "disconnecting client on fd \*" when worker process finished. 

Is there a way to block it from printing this kind of logging info, like setting an environment variable?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13920?focusedCommentId=17410881) by auderson (auderson):*
Setting stdout=devnull for subprocess fixed this problem
